API Reference¶

Handling study data¶

megfractal.subject:

SubjectRecording

Dataclass holding recordings for a given subject

SensorRecording

SourceRecording

NoiseCorrectedRecording

Study

This class gathers all recordings from a given study.

plot_topo

plot_compare_topo

plot_SNR_topo

plot_epochs_topo
